Title: The Bridge at Remagen
Writer: Richard Yates (screenplay), William Roberts (screenplay), Roger O. Hirson (story)
Actors: George Segal, Robert Vaughn, Ben Gazzara, Bradford Dillman
Plot: In the last days of World War II, the Allied Army desperately searched for a bridgehead across the impenetrable Rhine River, in order to launch a major assault into the center of Germany. "Bridge at Remagen" tells the true story of the battle for this last bridgehead, from both the German and American perspective.
